Description: Two mosaic slices joined: assembled from two slices of different canes to form a female head, frontal. Mounted on a thin slice of modern glass. The field is of translucent green glass.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: Sale Catalogue, Comte de Pourtalès-Gorgier Collection, Paris, 6 February-21 March 1865, no. 1363.
Bibliographic references: Tait 1991 / Five Thousand Years of Glass (pl.59)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Comte James Alexandre de Pourtalès-Gorgier (executors of)
